Package arcade.vis

Class EnvDrawer2D

java.lang.Object
arcade.vis.Drawer
arcade.vis.EnvDrawer2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnvDrawer2D.Rectangular, EnvDrawer2D.Triangular
public abstract class EnvDrawer2D
extends Drawer
Drawer for environment lattices in 2D.

EnvDrawer2D copies values in a Lattice array into a 2D array representation.

Since:
2.2
Version:
2.3.4
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • EnvDrawer2D

      EnvDrawer2D​(Panel panel, java.lang.String name, int length, int width, int depth, sim.util.gui.ColorMap map, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double bounds)
      Creates a Drawer for drawing environment lattices.
      Parameters:
      panel - the panel the drawer is attached to
      name - the name of the drawer
      length - the length of array (x direction)
      width - the width of array (y direction)
      depth - the depth of array (z direction)
      map - the color map for the array
      bounds - the size of the drawer within the panel
